content.p: At the Language Centre, we are dedicated to achieve excellence in communicative skills in order to prepare our students for a wider scope of opportunities in todayâ€™s multilingual workforce.We incorporate a number of transferable skills that are much sought after by potential employers, including self-study and teamwork skills.
